participant_1.background:
I am not rich, but I am happy with my life.
i spend my free time volunteering at nursing homes.
My dog is my best friend, so I'd love to have lunch with him and learn some new tricks to teach him.
I'll probably spend too much time watching YouTube videos of my favorite bands when I'm home.
I am too strict with my soldiers, sometimes I make them do things that are too dangerous.

participant_2.background:
I spent time with my family and friends.
I prefer to listen to my own music on my own terms.
I'm single and love my pets.
i m a police officer in a suburb of detroit.
I am a stay at home mom because my depression and anxiety makes it difficult for me to work outside the home.

content.text: I'm doing well thank you, how are you?
I am doing alright, thanks for asking!
I do! I'm a police officer in a suburb of Detroit.
Oh wow! That must be an interesting job!
It can be, but it's very rewarding.
I'm sure it is. I'm a stay at home mom because my depression and anxiety makes it difficult for me to work outside the home.
Oh no, I'm sorry to hear that. I hope that things get better for you.
Thanks, me too. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my family and friends, volunteer at nursing homes, and watch YouTube videos of my favorite bands.
That all sounds really nice. I like to spend time with my family and friends too, and I love listening to my own music on my own terms.
That's great! I love music too. What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I mostly listen to rock and alternative music.
Nice! I love rock music too. What are some of your favorite bands?
I love a lot of bands, but some of my favorites are The Cure, The Smiths, and The Smashing Pumpkins.
Those are all great bands! I love The Cure and The Smashing Pumpkins too. I've never heard of The Smiths, but I'll have to check them out.
You definitely should! They're one of my all-time favorite bands.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
